description:
Aura Shinsanpei is a Rank 2 http://anidb.net/t7112 [Ghoul Investigator] and one of the second batch of recruits to the http://anidb.net/ch98963 [Quinx Squad]. He is the nephew of the Special Class Investigator http://anidb.net/ch95843 [Aura Kiyoko]. He is noted to not have any special achievements in the Academy, but his potential is anticipated.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Aura Shinsanpei
